duck: Communes of the Hérault department - The following is a list of the 343 communes of the Hérault département, in France.
Lunel is a commune in the Hérault department in southern France.
Hachmei Provence - The term Hachmei Provence refers to the Jewish rabbis of Provence, a province in southern France, which was a great Torah center in the times of the Tosafists.

'Lunel' is a commune in the Hérault department in southern France. According to
legend, Lunel was founded by Jews from Jericho in first century<ref></ref> and
an ancient synagogue may be seen there.

Lunel is located east of Montpellier and southwest of Nîmes (Gard).
